channel.title: Need help

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @coder_conner coder conner
item.description:
@coder_conner wrote:

Hi im coding a god emote, and i need some help. i can use the emote but i cant walk of run with it any help? heres the code tell me what to add

if (cmd[0].equals("god")) { p.requestForceChat("im ur fucking creater"); p.requestAnim(1500, 0); p.requestAnim(1501, 1); p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; p.updateReq = true; }

Read full topic
